Title: Love, Simon
Writer: Elizabeth Berger (screenplay by), Isaac Aptaker (screenplay by), Becky Albertalli (based on the novel "Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda" by)
Actors: Nick Robinson, Jennifer Garner, Josh Duhamel, Katherine Langford
Plot: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.
